name: Mortemforge: Acid Blood
description:
----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

Summary:

In the middle of a galaxy-wide war between gods, an artefact with the ability of triggering a cataclysm was sent to the planet REX-5. You walk this planet now after the ritual was initiated and the organic matter of most inhabitants has been extracted and stacked into an ocean of blood.

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

Made in about 10 hours for the GodotWildJam 50. Development will continue afterwards!

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

Having problems?:

If your mouse is not captured by the game after the intro, click on the game.
In the rush I forgot to add the RESET functionality, so if you need to do that, press ESC to release the mouse and then refresh the page!

If you are having any other problem, please let me know.

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----
